name: Beneath the Hamlet
description:
Beneath the Hamlet is a minimalist party turn-based dungeon walker.

it's early in development but fully playable.

the game consists of 4 areas to complete, each with many quests, different monsters and items. it has 4 hero types in the player party, each with unique abilities and spells. the game can be beaten, takes about 2/3 hours to complete. includes a very lightweight tutorial.

NOTE: super widescreen monitors are not supported

would be very grateful for any feedback or suggestions.
